synopsis.text:
Will the delicate petals of first love bloom or wilt under the pressures of high school life? Introverted Yui Yamada, a devoted gardener, finds herself captivated by the energetic and athletic Tomoka Kase, a star track runner. Despite their contrasting personalities, the seeds of an unexpected romance begin to sprout between the two girls as they navigate the complexities of love, friendship, and self-discovery.

As the pair learns to nurture their budding relationship amidst the challenges of academics and rumors, they must also face the looming threat of college entrance exams that could potentially tear them apart. Will Yui and Tomoka's love continue to blossom like the morning glories they first met by, or will the thorns of adolescence prove too much for their tender connection? Join these young women as they explore the enchanting, heartwarming world of first love in Asagao to Kase-san.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
